concept.shortdesc: Applicability: All devices. Regulatory markings subject to certification are applied to the device signifying the radio(s) is/are approved for use. Refer to the Declaration of Conformity (DoC) for details of other country markings. The DOC is available at: www.zebra.com/doc.

conbody.p:
Applicability: For devices that support e-labels
RG needs to add e-label access procedure (free text)
For Android devices, select ANDROID E-LABEL. For other devices, select CUSTOM E-LABEL and enter the text in the text field.
The regulatory marks specific to this device (including FCC and ISED) are available on the screen of the device by following these instructions: MUST ALSO INCLUDE ANDROID E-LABEL INSTRUCTIONS OR CUSTOM E-LABEL INSTRUCTIONS

ul.li: ANDROID E-LABEL Go to Settings Regulatory .
